A '''painting variant''' consists of a texture and a width and height in blocks.

== Definition ==

Painting variants can be defined in [[data pack]]s, as part of the directory structure below. Until [[Java Edition 1.21.6]] they can also be inlined in the [[Painting#Entity_data|entity data]] and {{cd|[[Data_component_format#painting/variant|painting/variant]]}} data component.

{{Data pack directory|painting_variant|{{ph|name}}.json}}

== JSON Format ==
Painting variants are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object. <section begin="json format" />
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: A [[resource location]] of the sprite to use. Has to be in the <code>painting</code> [[atlas]].
** {{nbt|int|width}}: The width of the painting in blocks, between 1 and 16.
** {{nbt|int|height}}: The height of the painting in blocks, between 1 and 16.
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|list}}{{nbt|compound|title}}: Text component to use as this painting's title. See [[Text component format]].
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|list}}{{nbt|compound|author}}: Text component to use as this painting's author. See [[Text component format]].<section end="json format" />
</div>
